SEARCH
Package gutek.services

Class ChartService

java.lang.Object
gutek.services.ChartService
@Service public class ChartService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing chart generation and translation of available ranges and chart types.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final Integer[]
    AVAILABLE_RANGES
    Array of available time ranges for generating charts, in days.
    private static final String[]
    AVAILABLE_RANGES_TRANSLATION_KEYS
    Array of translation keys corresponding to available time ranges for chart selection.
    private final List<StatisticsChart>
    availableCharts
    List of available chart types provided by the application.
    static final Integer
    MAX_RANGE
    Maximum time range available for chart generation.
    private final TranslationService
    translationService
    Service responsible for providing translations for different locales.

  • Method Details

    • getSelectedChart

      public javafx.scene.chart.Chart getSelectedChart(int typeIndex, int rangeIndex, DeckBase deck)
      Retrieves the selected chart based on the provided type index and time range index.
      Parameters:
      typeIndex - The index of the chart type.
      rangeIndex - The index of the time range.
      deck - The deck for which the chart is generated.
      Returns:
      The generated Chart for the specified parameters.

    • getAvailableChartsTitles

      public String[] getAvailableChartsTitles()
      Provides the titles of available charts for display.
      Returns:
      An array of chart titles as String.

    • getAvailableRanges

      public String[] getAvailableRanges()
      Retrieves the available time ranges for chart selection, translated into the current locale.
      Returns:
      An array of translated range descriptions as String.
